description: Serving clients throughout Hillsborough County and across the state from our office in Manchester, New Hampshire, the attorneys at the Law Office of Manning & Zimmerman provide unmatched counsel, advocacy and support to those who suffered a serious injury or loss as the result of someone else's negligence as well as those who suffered a debilitating injury or illness on the job...
